climbs.name: Say Hello to My Little Friend

content.description:
This is a high-quality route with great rock and one seriously hard move. 

  Make a short move to gain the horizontal crack, then up jugs to a steep section where the holds disappear. Dyno for a hidden crimp, then move left to better jugs. Continue straight up the beautiful orange rock with a right-facing edge to a small overlap. Over this using a nipple-hold, then up an easy slab to a ledge with a fixed anchor. 

  If you pull on a quickdraw, the route is 5.11a.
content.location: Begin on right side of the Underworld, about 40' before you reach the broken area that defines the right end of this subsection of rock, below an orange face with a horizontal crack just out of reach.

content.description:
Gymnastic and excellent, albeit short. 

  Make a face move off the ground to gain the crack. Up this, then reach up and left to a large flake. Lunge right to the base of a crack and climb this to a fixed anchor.
content.location: This is the leftmost route at the Underworld. Look for an orange scoop with a right-leaning crack.

content.description: This is the left side of the Slanting Cracks Wall.
